overview_of_class: This course covers elementary theories, methods, and operations in transmission electron microscopy (TEM)to help prepare graduate students in applying TEM in research.
name: Electron Microscopy
title: MEAS MAT_SCI 460-0-20 Electron Microscopy
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is restricted to MAT_SCI PhD Students Only.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course covers elementary theories, methods, and operations in transmission electron microscopy (TEM)to help prepare graduate students in applying TEM in research.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Two lectures per week accompanied by one, three hour laboratory session per week in which students are divided into small groups for operation of the electron microscope.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
P.B. Hirsch (et al), "Electron Microscopy of Thin Crystals," Krieger Publications, 1977
D.B. Williams & C.B. Carter, "Transmission Electron Microscopy," Plenum Press, 1996

subject: MAT_SCI
